column2: Does anyone who lives with you now do any of the following? Choose all that apply
column18: 2 = Use smokeless tobacco, such as chewing tobacco, snuff, dip, or snus
column19: 3 = Smoke cigars, cigarillos, or filtered cigars
column21: 5 = No one who lives with me now uses any form of tobacco

column2: Of the five closest friends or acquaintances that you spend time with on a regular basis, how many of them are smokers?
Thinking about the people who are important to you, how would you describe their opinion on using tobacco?
How would you describe most people's opinion of using tobacco?
